mapper.insert: INSERT INTO movie_tb (make_year, production, movie_name, synopsis, thumbnail, directing_intension, genre, running_grade, director, director_pic, actor, director_careers, director_awards_film, online_release_date, online_end_date, offline_release_date, offline_end_date, d_day) VALUES (#{makeYear}, #{production}, #{movieName}, #{synopsis}, #{thumbnail}, #{directingIntension}, #{genre}, #{runningGrade}, #{director}, #{directorPic}, #{actor}, #{directorCareers}, #{directorAwardsFilm}, #{onlineReleaseDate}, #{onlineEndDate}, #{offlineReleaseDate}, #{offlineEndDate}, #{dDay})

INSERT INTO movie_staff_tb (director, filming, art, sound, clothes, script, lighting, editing, music, movie_id) VALUES (#{director}, #{filming}, #{art}, #{sound}, #{clothes}, #{script}, #{lighting}, #{editing}, #{music}, #{movieId})
